resources.string: Speed Test includes 15 questions, with the timeline being 5 minutes. Do you want to start now?
Are you sure you want to quit this test?
The exam includes 40 questions, with the timeline being 50 minutes. Do you want to start now?
Swipe to the left for the next questions
Chemistry24 is a learning application for everyone wish to review chemistry knowledge for the university entrance examination.
This is a good solution for studying anywhere and at anytime. Chemistry24 provides a clear and reasonable path by covering both theories and exercises.

The application includes thoroughly brief lessons with thousands of questions. It also has hundreds of tests chosen from well-known high schools all over the country. And Chemistry24 has a special method for you to review anywhere and at anytime easily.
The Admins of Chemistry24 hope that this application will help you review optimally and get high results in the upcoming exams.
Do you have any feedback on our application?
